mapper.select:
select cid.id, cid.shop_list_id, cid.name, cid.title, cid.tel, cid.address, s.publish_start, s.publish_end from corporate_info_detail cid inner join shop as s on cid.shop_list_id = s.id where cid.del_flg = 0 and s.del_flg = 0
and cid.name like '%${name}%'
and date_format(s.publish_start,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{publishStart},'%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(s.publish_end,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{publishEnd},'%Y-%m-%d')
order by ${orderStatement} LIMIT #{length,jdbcType=INTEGER} OFFSET #{start,jdbcType=INTEGER};

select count(cid.id) from corporate_info_detail cid inner join shop as s on cid.shop_list_id = s.id where cid.del_flg = 0 and s.del_flg = 0
and cid.name like '%${name}%'
and date_format(s.publish_start,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{publishStart},'%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(s.publish_end,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{publishEnd},'%Y-%m-%d')
